headline: Radish harvests in Lower Silesia higher than ever before
text:
Lower Silesian farmers celebrating a record-breaking radish harvest, local markets filled with produce, radish enthusiasts overjoyed.

"I don't care" - said Stjepan Horvat, a random citizen of Zagreb, Croatia, when interviewed on the street.

headline: Damp Rag Journalist Safest Job Ever?
text: Ever since our studio was founded just a day ago, each one of our journalists has been alive, resulting in a fatality rate of 0% for the aforementioned job. Apply for a job at The Damp Rag and gain immortality now!

headline: Birth rate of people born in 2024 has rapidly declined in just a single day
text: Experts baffled as the birth rate of people born in 2024 statistic rapidly dropped to 0 in the midnight between 31st of December 2024 and 1st of January 2025.

headline: Poll shows that nearly 100% of people are alright with answering polls
text: After conducting a research, our journalist has concluded that 100% of people are willing to answer a poll according to research done in various major cities.

headline: Time travel NOT invented
text: Our team of cartographers definitely HASN'T invented a working time travel machine, NOT letting us to go to any time we wish. Sadly due to us NOT inventing time travel we CAN'T share this revolutionary technology with the world and we will NOT be able to use it to get more writing material.

headline: Grug smash! Tog see big shiny thing.
text:
Thunk thunk, clonk! "Ug!" say Gnorg, "Why Grok take stick? Stick Brog's!" Brog say, "No, Grok find stick first. You go hunt rock!"

Ook-blargh flargh! Gorak say moon too big, sky fall soon! Chunga bunga, more fire! Me want big shiny rock; make loud BOOM!

Zug-zug, Blarg need sleep. Ug ug, Nog dig hole. Rumblo-flumbo wumba! Gronk dance good, ooga booga boogie!

headline: Dead bodies found buried at a cementery.
text:
While looking for the body of a recently murdered man, police dogs have sniffed hundreds of dead bodies buried in coffins perfectly fit in grave plots near Bruges in Belgium.

"This cannot be a coincedence. There must be a serial killer roaming around murdering innocent people and burying them here. We are shocked how this hadn't ever been discovered earlier." - says chief of police. Investigations began at an enormous scale, $1000000 reward for the person who manages to capture the killer.

"It's a cementery, oboviously there are going to be dead bodies there. How is that guy even allowed to be chief of police." says Croatian citizen Stjepan Horvat when interviewed in Zagreb. After this statement he became one of our suspects.

headline: The Zerpvloxian empire declares war on the Kepler-22bians.
text: The ruler of Zerpvloxia has delclared wer on Kepler-22b over resources, claiming that "Wood is an incredibly rare and valuable resource and the greedy Kepler-22bians refuse to trade.". The Zerpvloxian army has reportedly broken the Galactic Code countless times, while the Kepler-22bians stood their ground defending themselves with mega proton missiles. "We would trade with the Zerpvloxians if they didn't turn every single material in the galaxy into a deadly weapon." - says the finance minister of Kepler-22b. The Great Emperor of the Universe Stjepan Horvat has chosen not to side with either.
